Install

pip install LDtools

How to use

{% raw %} 
lf = Liftover('hg38','hg19')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
vcf ='/home/yh3455/Github/SEQLinkage/MWE/small_sample_ii_coding.vcf.gz'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
lf.vcf_liftover(vcf)
{% endraw %}
